Straight Shot nods in agreement.

" You're absolutely right.  Nightshift, m=
ind giving us both a ride back ta the Ark?"

Nightshift turns to Straight S=
hot with a kind hearted smile. As he does so, he spots a strange animal, sm=
all, slow but, covered head to toe with long prickly quills.

" Sure no pro=
b but, what's that thing behind ya?"

Straight Shot turns around with Elita=
 still in her hands.  

" Gee, I don't know.  Kinda cute though, isn't it? =
 Careful Elita, this little creature has sharp quills and I wouldn't want y=
ou ta get one in ya."

The porcupine looks at them curiously while nibbling=
 on some wild fruits.  Straight Shot can not help but be curious about the =
creature.   Her curiosity leads to a premature scanning process, which is a=
ccidentally set off.

" Oops!  I activated a form alteration program by mis=
take.  Here, Nightshift, hold Elita."

She hands her to him as he watches h=
er go through a rather awkward but fitting change.  It's not long before sh=
e becomes the creature which made her curious.  She looks to her new robot =
mode which has her armored with sharp projectile quills on her upper armor,=
 gauntlets and boots.  Her helm remains the same as before as her facial fe=
atures show a slight hint of the animal's feature.

" Well, I guess this so=
rta does kind of fit me.  Ohh boy, wait till Tucson gets a load of this."

=
Nightshift looks to her in awe.

" YOU KIDD'N ME!? THAT IS ONE KICK AFT BEA=
ST FORM!  Just think, no Preds gonna mess with ya now, those quills are sha=
rp, barbed and take a slag of a time ta pull out.  Nice change up Straight =
Shot."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 16, 2011, at =

 =E2=80=9CHe dont scare me=E2=80=9Dsaid Elita with a childish tone and adde=
d =E2=80=9CI=E2=80=99ll teach you a lesson, but mommie needs me more... We =
should come back home=E2=80=9D

cious glare from the both of them as they keep a protective embrace around =
